home.headline: Askold Astakhov — Software Engineer and TeamLead
home.subline: I am Askold Astakhov, a Lead Software Engineer at Weigandt Consulting, where I build websites, mobile applications and complex information systems such as CRM and ERP. In my spare time, I develop my own projects.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Askold is a developer specializing in creating user interfaces and web applications. He strives to transform complex tasks into simple and elegant solutions, combining design and technology. His experience spans designing digital interfaces, interactive experiences, and developing web applications.

Weigandt Consulting.achievements: Increased team productivity by 15% through process optimization and the introduction of efficiency metrics.;Reduced deployment time by 20% by creating an automated CI/CD pipeline using GitLab.;Developed the architecture and led the development of a document management system for a large company, ensuring high performance and scalability.;Implemented Scrum methodology, improving team collaboration and development speed.;Created an ERP system for a pharmaceutical company, providing advanced visual customization and data analysis capabilities.

Luxoft.achievements: Ensured timely and high-quality project delivery, leading a team of developers.;Developed comprehensive testing strategies using Playwright, improving system stability and test coverage;Created scalable systems for managing inventory and personnel for a large energy company.;Led the development of a global NFT marketplace, optimizing performance for high traffic.;Created an informational resource for a major gaming studio, improving user experience and system responsiveness.

Webit.achievements: Implemented Lean/Agile practices in new projects, optimizing project management and reducing delivery times.;Organized meetups for front-end developers, fostering a collaborative learning environment.;Developed information systems and websites using React and Vue.js for major clients.;Created backend systems using PHP and MySQL, ensuring seamless integration with front-end components.;Completed several e-commerce projects and created custom content management systems, ensuring scalability.

ICS Monitoring.achievements: Developed 70% of the front-end and 1/3 of the back-end for an e-commerce project, meeting tight deadlines.;Led the front-end development, optimizing UX/UI design and implementing dynamic features.;Launched a functional wine marketplace, increasing user engagement and sales metrics.

Seoproduction.achievements: Optimized development processes by implementing CI/CD pipelines across all company projects.;Standardized project planning processes, improving resource allocation and milestone tracking.;Developed and maintained over 20 e-commerce websites, optimizing performance and scalability.;Built websites on popular CMS platforms, including Bitrix, WordPress and Joomla, ensuring cross-platform compatibility.
